Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCBaseBehavior.addFieldInError(Control)
    use YRCBaseBehavior.addFieldInError(Control, String) instead.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDateTimeUtils.getDate(String, boolean, String, Locale) 
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDateTimeUtils.getDate(String, boolean, String, Locale, TimeZone)
    Call getDate(String dateStr, boolean ignoreTime, String format, ULocale lc, TimeZone timeZone) instead.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCI18NUtils.getDefaultLocale()
    Call ULocale getDefaultULocale() instead.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.foundation.containers.store.YRCStoreWorkbenchAdvisor.getInstructionWindow()
    Use SOPApplicationContext.getInstance().getInstructionWindow()
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCLocale.getJLocale() 
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDateTimeUtils.getString(Date, boolean, String, Locale)
    call getString(Date date, boolean ignoreTime , String format, ULocale lc) instead
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDateTimeUtils.getString(Date, boolean, String, Locale, TimeZone)
    call getString(Date date, boolean ignoreTime , String format, ULocale lc, TimeZone tz) instead
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCI18NUtils.getSystemLocale()
    Call ULocale getSystemULocale() instead.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCDateTimeUtils.getTimestamp(String, boolean, String, Locale) 
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCI18NUtils.getUserLocale()
    Call ULocale getUserULocale() instead.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCXmlEditorInput.getXml()
    getXml is deprecated so as to discourage, changes to the documented editor input xml. Ideally once the editor input is created with an input element, it should not be changed.
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCLocale.setLocale(Document) 
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCI18NUtils.setSystemLocale(Locale)
    Call setSystemLocale(ULocale systemLocale)
    com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCI18NUtils.setUserLocale(Locale)
    Call setUserLocale(ULocale userLocale) instead
